title: Solving Systems of Equations in Word Problems
body: Hannah has to make twenty-five gallons of punch for a potluck. The punch is made of soda and fruit drink. The cost of the soda is $1.79 per gallon and the cost of the fruit drink is $2.49 per gallon. Hannah’s budget requires that the punch cost $2.21 per gallon.
lesson: 5.5 Solve Mixture Applications with Systems of Equations
